name: Mabel Henderson
descriptions: Mabel Henderson is one of the inhabitants of Vault 112 trapped in the Tranquility Lane virtual reality simulation, met in Fallout 3.
A resident of Vault 112 for over 200 years,

However, they also recognize her as a prime source of news on what's going on in Tranquility Lane. This earns Mabel the scorn of some: Pat Neusbaum distrusts and dislikes Mabel both for being a busybody,

Martha Simpson is Mabel's closest friend and confidante. The one issue on which they disagree is robotics: While Martha is an enthusiast of robots, Mabel dislikes them. Though she has a Mister Handy at home, she feels uncomfortable in its presence, feeling watched and unsafe. If she wasn't reliant on it for house chores, she'd rather get rid of it - completely, rather than picking something out of the "new" RobCo catalogue, as Martha suggested.
By 2277, Henderson's vitals indicate a state of deep contentment: 82 beats per minute, 110/70 mmHg of blood pressure, 98.3°F/36.8°C temperature, 13 breaths per minute, and nominal stress levels.
Mabel starting her oven, in one of the "creative" ways to kill her.

topics.response_text: Hello there, dear. Beautiful weather we're having, wouldn't you say?

topics.topic_text: I heard you bake really tasty pies. Can you make one for me?

topics.response_text: Well of course it is. What a silly thing to say. What else would it be?

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the neighborhood?
topics.response_text: Well, there's certainly never a dull moment. I think it's like any other street, really.
No, I haven't. But when I do, I'll tell him you're looking for him.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me anything about the Rockwells' marriage?
topics.response_text: Well, they're just so nice, aren't they? It's good the two of them worked everything out.

topics.topic: MQ04ResidentSimulationThis is a pretty convincing simulation...
topics.topic_text: This is what, some kind of computer simulation?
topics.response_text: Computer what now? Why don't you go find Timmy and have a nice game of catch?{amused, dismissive}

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Timmy Neusbaum?
topics.response_text: I'm not one to gossip, but that boy's in trouble, if you ask me. Growing up so attached to his parents like that.

topics.topic_text: What do you mean, "worked everything out"?
topics.response_text: Oh, I... Well, I'm not one to talk, but there was that fight last year. Everyone could hear them arguing.

topics.topic_text: So they've had some problems in the past?
Hey, maybe you should mind your own business.

topics.response_text: Tip? Oh, I wouldn't call it that. Just something I heard, is all.

conversation.response_text: Oh, dear. Is that old radio on the fritz again? I should turn it off.
Timmy Neusbaum left his roller skates in my house again. How many times have I talked to Pat about that?
No, no. I don't like robots. Don't like the one I have, and don't want a new one. If I didn't rely on the thing so much, I'd just get rid of it.
Roger and Janet seem to be getting along better, don't you think?
Well, maybe you feel that way. I really don't like it. What if something goes wrong?
Well, if you ever have any thoughts about it... You know, if you want to talk, you just let me know.
